================================================
NetScriptGen Tutorial
================================================


In this tutorial, we will cover everything you need for generate your scripts.
First, you will learn how to store the data in an Excel Workbook, and secondly, how to write a template.
There are some practical examples for more understanding.


Before we begin, make sure that the following prerequisites are met :

- You have already installed NetScriptGen
- You must have Microsoft Excel version 2010 or higher (respects the XML standard)
- You are drinking a smooth coffee


Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   tutorial_workbook
   tutorial_template
   tutorial_example
